description_html:
ADJUSTABLE TEAR DROP TABLE

The Tear Drop table is a small yet significant piece of furniture. Elegant and sculptural. Understated and timeless. This highly functional side table with a sculptural shape is height adjustable making it perfectly adaptable for any setting. The Tear Drop table blends effortlessly into any surrounding and is the perfect compliment to any modern or classic interior from private offices, lounges, breakout areas and public spaces. The shapely tables are available in a variety powder coated finishes in both fixed height and adjustable height options. Table tops are offered in laminate or wood veneer. An expandable version of the square table top is also available. Made for even smaller spaces, this dynamic design offers all the clever space saving you require in a small, minimalist area. The table is incredibly easy to adjust, and with a couple of moves it doubles the table top size for when more surface space is required. The Tear Drop table is a uniquely adaptable design that brings an eclectic, sculptural element to any workplace.
